testcase.name: User should be able to registration new account successfully
testcase.system-out: Given User go to the NopCommerce Home page..................................passed And User navigate to the Registration page..................................passed When User select the "Male" as gender.......................................passed And User set first name and last name.......................................passed And User set "20/05/1995" as date of birth..................................passed And User set "" as email....................................................passed And User set "Brainstation-23" as company details...........................passed And User set Newsletter option as "checked".................................passed And User set "pass@1234" as password and confirm password again.............passed And User click on the Register button.......................................passed Then Verify that the new account registration message "Your registration completed" is displayed.passed

testcase.name: User should be able to successfully place order as a guest user
testcase.system-out: Given User go to the NopCommerce Home page..................................passed When User click "Cell phones" option from "Electronics" category............passed And User click on the "Nokia Lumia 1020" for product details................passed And User set the quantity number 2 in the quantity field....................passed And User click on the "ADD TO CART" button..................................passed And User go to the shipping cart page.......................................passed And User accept terms conditions and click checkout button..................passed And User click checkout as guest button.....................................passed And User input all the billing details and click continue...................passed And User select shipping method "Next Day Air" and click continue...........passed And User select payment method "Credit Card" and click continue.............passed And User select "Visa" card and input card information......................passed And User click confirm button to place the order............................passed Then Verify that the order place message "Your order has been successfully processed!" is displayed.passed
